mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CALENDAR_INVITE ( ID, CALENDAR_INVITE_INVITED_MEMBER_ID, CALENDAR_INVITE_HOST_ID, CALENDAR_INVITE_IS_APPROVED, CALENDAR_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_CALENDAR_INVITE.NEXTVAL, #{calendarInviteInvitedMemberId}, #{calendarInviteHostId}, #{calendarInviteIsApproved}, #{calendarId} )
INSERT INTO TBL_CALENDAR_MEMBER (ID, CALENDAR_MEMBER_IS_HOST, CALENDAR_ID, MEMBER_ID) VALUES ( SEQ_CALENDAR_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{calendarMemberIsHost}, #{calendarId}, #{memberId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT TBM.ID AS MEMBER_ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME, CASE WHEN TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_IS_APPROVED = 0 THEN '초대대기중' ELSE '초대' END AS INVITE_STATUS FROM TBL_MEMBER TBM
-- 캘린더 멤버 LEFT JOIN LEFT JOIN TBL_CALENDAR_MEMBER TBCM ON TBCM.CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId} AND TBCM.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID
-- 초대 여부 LEFT JOIN LEFT JOIN TBL_CALENDAR_INVITE TBCI ON TBCI.CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId} AND TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_INVITED_MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID
WHERE TBM.ID != #{memberId} AND TBCM.MEMBER_ID IS NULL AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_FOLLOW F1 WHERE F1.FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID AND F1.FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TBL_FOLLOW F2 WHERE F2.FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID AND F2.FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} )

SELECT DISTINCT TBM.ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME FROM TBL_CALENDAR_MEMBER TBCM JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBCM.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID WHERE CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId} AND CALENDAR_MEMBER_IS_HOST =0

SELECT DISTINCT TBM.ID AS MEMBER_ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, TBM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME,TBCM.CALENDAR_MEMBER_IS_HOST FROM TBL_CALENDAR_MEMBER TBCM JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBCM.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID WHERE CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId}

SELECT TBCI.ID, TBCI.CALENDAR_ID, TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_HOST_ID, TBM.MEMBER_NAME, TBC.CALENDAR_TITLE, TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_IS_APPROVED FROM TBL_CALENDAR_INVITE TBCI JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_HOST_ID = TBM.ID JOIN TBL_CALENDAR TBC ON TBCI.CALENDAR_ID = TBC.ID WHERE TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_INVITED_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_IS_APPROVED = 0

SELECT TBM.MEMBER_NAME, CAL.CALENDAR_TITLE FROM TBL_CALENDAR_INVITE TBCI JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_HOST_ID = TBM.ID JOIN TBL_CALENDAR CAL ON TBCI.CALENDAR_ID = CAL.ID WHERE TBCI.CALENDAR_ID = #{calendarId} AND TBCI.CALENDAR_INVITE_HOST_ID = #{calendarInviteHostId}
